Reviews.Title: Great Camera.
Reviews.Author: Shurrine Campbell-Carr
Reviews.Content: I don't know much about cameras and started a photography class after i bought the camera.  But I liked the camera package ,that is, the memory card, tripod, cleaning kit, etc that came with the camera.  So far this camera has meet all my expectations and have lived up to what they it could do.  The zoom is great and it's easy to handle.  I am having fun going through the features to see what it can do.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!!
Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: Great deal for an awesome camera!! Everything was just as advertised. Getting all the extras was just icing on the cake!!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Glee
Reviews.Content: We just received it and started using it but so far am definitely impressed with the ease of use. Also liked all the accessories that came with it.  Always handy to have an extra battery.

Reviews.Title: Package included comes with the wrong HDMI cable.  Doesnt fit this camera
Reviews.Author: J. Dunnican "jwd22"
Reviews.Content: In this pacakge, high speed HDMI cable is the wrong one for this camera.  It comes as HDMI to micro hdmi.  Needs to be the mid size.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix P520
Reviews.Author: Rochelle
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  I'm still learning to use it well but so far I'm very pleased with the results.

Reviews.Title: satisfied
Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: The camera is great and very user friendly. I am very satisfied with all items included.Everything listed was included and works great.

Reviews.Title: Love the COOLPIX P520
Reviews.Author: Brian C "Brian"
Reviews.Content: The camera is very unique and adjustable to all situations.  This camera allows you to maneuver in any posses of different creations that can be implemented to a prefect shot; excellent or amateur photographer can be seen as one....

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: williamjerow
Reviews.Content: Love the zoom and it is easy to use. Having a viewer to use and not having to look at a screen is a huge help in bright sun light

Reviews.Title: I like the camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "jw"
Reviews.Content: The camera is awesome.  The tripod had a rusted bolt, is broke and I am just making it work, but ticked me off they sent me an inferior tripod.  Everything else is great.  Camera is awesome for as little as I know about photography.  Takes great videos and pictures of my kids.

Reviews.Title: Love it but believe there is a problem with the camera
Reviews.Author: Carroll S. Bostic
Reviews.Content: The camera does everything I want but when I focus on a person the zoom goes by itself very close.  I don't understand why it does this and need to find out if the camera isn't working correctly.

Reviews.Title: incorrect card reader
Reviews.Author: Nekeisha Samuels
Reviews.Content: Everything is great except i received a card reader with a USB cord connection. Not wireless as seen on here. As a matter of fact it looks completely different and doesn't appear to be durable. Very Disappointed with the substitute wired card reader.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Marco Quesada Sandi
Reviews.Content: This camera is great, easy to use and have a very good quality in the pictures. All the rest of the equipment that bring with the camera is great. I totaly recomended!

Reviews.Title: So happy
Reviews.Author: Harry
Reviews.Content: Camera is great and not heavy, carry bag is good size, 32GB memory card is included. I am afraid to use the battery cuz not from NIKON. Most staffs what you need already there, so you can start soon.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: D. Nolen
Reviews.Content: This camera has it all!!! Awesome Kit to get started with. A must have to all camera lovers; best of all the Seller BEACH CAMERA rocks!!!

Reviews.Title: Very Fast Shipping
Reviews.Author: K. Logan "KLO"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sister in-law.  She wanted a good camera without getting a DSLR.  She has kids and wanted to be able to take good quality pictures.  Great camera.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy!
Reviews.Author: Matt62983
Reviews.Content: Great camera, great price. Got everything as advertised. The quality of all the extras isn't all that great, but definitely worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Donald R. Diehl
Reviews.Content: Everything came sooner than promised and in great condition, Loving the camera and all of the attachments,  Great pictures and easy to use

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Patricia Andrews
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for a Nikon camera for quite awhile that I could use with very little photography experience. I am super pleased with this product. We took it on vacation and I was very pleased with the quality of photos, video and ease of use. The instruction booklet was very easy to understand and I have had so much fun learning all the new things my camera will do.  I would highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Deal!!
Reviews.Author: Dooniegirl
Reviews.Content: This bundle package can't be beat!  The camera is awesome.  I wasn't sure which camera to choose, but after some research I fell in love.  I see this new purchase as my travel buddy as I explore the world and its beauty...from the stars to the landscape and so much more.  Everything in the package was in perfect condition.  I wouldn't change a thing about this purchase.  The seller (toolsngamz) was awesome too.  Actually included a few unexpected extras.  Well, gotta get out n snap some pics!  Hope this review was helpful :)

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: This was the purchase that got me to sign up for PRIME (Love the free shipping).  The camera is great and I ended up buying a PDF manual to help me figure it out.  Lots of options.  I love the black and white option and sport feature.  Taking pictures of moving targets is now easy.  The bundle with tripod and extra battery was a bonus.

Reviews.Title: Excelent purchase
Reviews.Author: Gulla Federico
Reviews.Content: Was an excellent purchase, my wife love it, it's easy to use and the accesories are exact to use with the camera.

Reviews.Title: returned because of new style view finder
Reviews.Author: Linda Paul
Reviews.Content: I didn't care for the new style view finder.  I ordered the P510 and love it.  Takes great photos & videos.

Reviews.Title: nikon coolpix p520
Reviews.Author: Margaret Hunnicutt
Reviews.Content: disappointed that I can shoot in RAW. I do like the camera but shooting in RAW is a must for me.

Reviews.Title: Awesome buy!
Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: Was happy with this Camera and all the great accessories. Came quickly and was cheaper than most cameras on its level..plus it came with ALOT of necessities. Very happy with it. Will recommend!

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX is GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: I run a dog rescue, and it is SO hard to get good pictures of dogs, especially puppies who will NOT be still :)  This camera offers options that have allowed me to begin getting great pictures in fewer tries :)  I love the quality of the pictures as well, even on lower resolution, the pictures come out very clear.  This is the first Nikon digital I have owned, and it is perfect for what I need.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix Bundle!
Reviews.Author: antonio
Reviews.Content: I think this was a great deal and especially with the tri-pods for those moments when there's no one around to take the picture so that you may be included with your family/friends. Carrying case, battery, etc... Love it!!!!

Reviews.Title: Totally Satisfied!
Reviews.Author: Sheldon
Reviews.Content: First the bundle of accessories was fantastic for such a small difference in price vs the camera price by itself. Second it came days earlier than it's guesstimated arrival date. Third the Nikon p520 is an excellent camera in every way. And finally I am totally satisfied because the camera still has a view finder, to me a camera is not totally functional without one. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: excelent camera
Reviews.Author: steve brewster
Reviews.Content: excellent photos, the camera is easy to use. the package contains everything you need to take good photos. I am extreamily satisfied with the camera.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!!
Reviews.Author: Julio Fernandez
Reviews.Content: This deal is an amazing one. Was not disappointed at all. Bought this as a gift for my girlfriend and she was blown away

Reviews.Title: Great Bundled Deal
Reviews.Author: Joshua P. Ochsankehl "Ox"
Reviews.Content: Bought this product for my wife and it was the perfect match.  This bundle contains everything you would need for a basic setup an shoot works out of the box and requires very little thought.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: wonderful camera
Reviews.Author: Sherry Bischer
Reviews.Content: Love this camera.  Takes wonderful pictures, easy to operate, great zoom.  The accessory package is very helpful.  I would recommend this to anyone

Reviews.Title: Coolpix p520 as a gift
Reviews.Author: Sandy McConnell
Reviews.Content: the recipient was delighted to receive this camera as a Christmas gift.  He can't wait to start taking photos.Thanks,Sandy

Reviews.Title: Outstanding
Reviews.Author: Shoreliner
Reviews.Content: Purchasing the entire kit was an outstanding feature  camera very user friendly and picture quality perfect only suggestion is to have an extra battery on hand if using for any length of time.  Would have liked to have had an interchangable lens feature.  Next upgrade though will be that feature.  Would highly recommend this camera to anyone even first time users

ProductInfo.Features:
18.1 MP CMOS sensor for exceptional image quality and enhanced low-light performance.Record videos in Full 1080p HD with stereo sound.
Powerful 42x zoom that lets you shoot amazing close-ups
Built-in GPS records the location of each shot you take
Wi-Fi WU-1a accessory (not included) allows you to easily share your shots anytime anywhere
1080p Full HD videos with stereo sound for dazzling movies
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX P520 18.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 42x Zoom and "GPS" (Black) + EN-EL5 Battery + 9pc Bundle 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
